document_data.name: Aubree Lucent
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aubree Lucent''' was a [[paladin]] of [[Torm]] and member of the [[Hellriders]] who served [[Elturel]] with honor during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was among those within the city immediately following [[the Descent|its Descent]] to the [[Nine Hells]], and famously confronted a powerful [[archdevil]] during her adventures.

{{Quote|When I was a child, my father told me about a holy warrior who descended from above. He told me of the glory she brought to Elturel...the courage that inspired generations of paladins to fight evil every single day.|Aubree, speaking about the angel [[Zariel]] and [[the Ride]] into the Nine Hells.}}
document_data.Personality: While she was still young, Aubree was a devoted and determined paladin-in-training.
document_data.Possessions: Aubree's preferred weapon was a one-handed [[warhammer]].
document_data.Relationships: She was daughter of Sir [[Alusair Lucent]], a fellow paladin of Torm and knight of the Hellriders.
